content:
Sure, here are five contemporary jazz artists who incorporate electronic music into their work:

1. Robert Glasper - Robert Glasper is a pianist and composer who blends jazz, hip-hop, and R&B. His work often includes electronic beats and samples.

2. Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah - Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah is a trumpeter and composer who fuses jazz with elements of rock, hip-hop, and electronic music.

3. Flying Lotus - Flying Lotus is a producer and electronic musician who creates experimental music that blends jazz, hip-hop, and electronic music.

4. Kamasi Washington - Kamasi Washington is a saxophonist and composer who incorporates elements of free jazz, funk, and hip-hop into his music. His work often features electronic textures and production.

5. Nubya Garcia - Nubya Garcia is a saxophonist and composer who combines jazz with elements of afrobeat and electronic music. Her music often features synthesizers and other electronic instruments.
